page.title: 08 SCHOOLING
page.content:
SCHOOLING
In our area we have four First Schools which feed the Stokenchurch Middle School. Three of these are small village schools,Radnage,Ibstone and ours, {Mary Towerton,}and the other is at Stokenchurch. Until 1984 the children were moved on at the age of 9 years, but this year we leave at 8 years old. The Middle School caters for 8_12 year olds. At the age of 12 we are transferred to one of the High Wycombe Grammar Schools (by selection exam),or to the Secondary School next door. At the moment there is a move afoot to close this{Bartholomew {Tipping's}School.This is meeting with much local opposition.
